name: Weekendesk
introduction:
As soon as I arrived at Weekendesk, I started working on redesigning the Weekendesk experience.
Today, the new mobile version is online.

details.intro: What I aldready did in th last 18 months and what I am proud of :
list: Implementation of a product design workflow with Abstract(versioning, storage, collaboration) and Sketch
Implemenntation of design ceremonies: design reviews, design presentations, design team meetings.
Establishment of collaboration and processes (based on user behavior, data, etc.) with Product Managers
Creating the Design System from a Sketch Design Library to shared documentation with front-end developers

name: Design Systems France
introduction: I created Design Systems France to meet my needs to get inspired by my peers and learn from their experience.
